LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceChanceModifierDesc: General chance modifier for any social interaction to be romantic. Default: 1
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceChanceModifierSingl: Additional factor applied if both pawns are single. Default: 1
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceChanceModifierDiffe: If pawns are from different factions, also apply this modifier. Set below 1 to discourage pawns to romance visitors. Also applies to guests from different factions. Default: 1
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.IncestModifier_Close_Desc: Factor for Sibling / Halfsibling / Parent / Child. Default: 1. Note: Unless romanceChanceFactor is changed in defs, close incest is extremely unlikely regardless of factor set here.
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.IncestModifier_Medium_Desc: Factor for Cousin / Uncle / Aunt / Nephew / Niece / Grandparent / Grandchild. Default: 1
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.IncestModifier_Far_Desc: Factor for Great-Grandparent / Great-Grandchild / Granduncle / Grandaunt / Kin. Default: 1
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceSuccessModifier_Des: Factor for the chance that a romance attempt is successful. Default: 1
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.BreakupChanceModifier_Desc: Probably influences the chance that a social interaction of a couple results in a breakup. Default: 1
